description: This table contains information about patient code statuses, which are mainly used for documenting compliance reasons and quality. This table replaces the older IP_CODE_STATUS table.

columns.name: OCS_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the code status record.

columns.name: OCS_NAME
columns.description: The name of the code status record.

columns.name: OCS_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This stores the status of the record (hidden, soft deleted, etc.)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted

columns.name: CODE_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Code status category value.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


<Disabled>


Full Code


DNR


Partial Code

columns.name: ACTIVATED_INST
columns.description: The instant at which the code status (full code, DNR, etc.) was created.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the user that created the code status

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the code status order record.

columns.name: COMMENTS
columns.description: The comment associated with the code status.

columns.name: INACTIVATED_INST
columns.description: The instant at which the code status was inactivated.

columns.name: CONTEXT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The context (inpatient/ambulatory/etc.) in which the status was recorded.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Outpatient


Inpatient


HOV


ED


Surgery


Demographics


Home Health


Hospice

columns.name: PATIENT_ID
columns.description: The patient for which this code status was recorded.

columns.name: PATIENT_CSN
columns.description: The Contact Serial Number of the encounter in which the code status order was placed.

columns.name: ACTV_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Holds the instant the code status was activated in UTC time.

columns.name: INACTV_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant at which the code status was inactivated in UTC time.

columns.name: VERBAL_ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the home care order that created this code status record.
